ERR_INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid login credentials! Please enter correct username and password.
ERR_RESET_OLD_PASSWORD: New password cannot be the same as the old password.
ERR_CUS_TRANSACTION_TYPE_NOT_FOUND: Customer transaction type with given ID does not exist.
EXPIRE_OTP: OTP has expired. Please try again!
ERR_DATE_RECEIVED: Received date cannot be a future date.
ERR_DATE_DIFFERENCE: Purchase date cannot be later than the processing date.
ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops. Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERR_TICKET_USERS_EXIST: The task already include a few chosen users.
ERR_TICKET_TAGS_EXIST: The task already include a few chosen flags.
ERR_TICKET_TAG_NOT_FOUND: The flag is not attached to the task.
ERR_TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS: Whoops! This flag has already been added.
ERR_VALID_TAG_DATA: Please provide either a new flag or the flag ID.
ERR_USER_DEPARTMENT_EXIST: The user already include a few chosen teams.
ERR_DELETED_ACC: Your account has been deleted. Kindly contact the Admin.
ERR_INACTIVE_ACC: Your account has been inactive. Kindly contact the Admin.
ERR_TRADE_IN_INFO_MAX: You can add up to 4 tread-in, Delete added trade-in to add new trade-in.
ERR_LIEN_MASTER_ALREADY_EXIST: A record with the same holder name, address, state, city and zip code already exists.
ERR_LIEN_INFO_EXCEED_LIMIT: You can add up to 2 lien, Delete added lien to add new lien.
ERR_PLATE_IMAGE_OUT_OF_SIZE: Image size exceeds the maximum limit of 20 MB.
ERR_PLATE_IMAGE_TYPE: Invalid file type. Only jpeg, jpg, png, pdf, svg files are allowed.
ERR_DIR_CREATE: An error occurred while creating the directory.
ERR_FILE_CSV_UPLOAD: Uploaded file must be a csv.
ERR_DEPOSIT_DATA_NOT_FOUND: Billing deposit data with given ID does not exist.
ERR_DEPOSIT_COUNTY_LIMIT: Maximum 2 data are allowed for Deposit to County, Delete added data to add a new one.
ERR_DEPOSIT_US_LIMIT: Maximum 6 data are allowed for Deposit to Us, Delete added data to add a new one.
ERR_BILLING_DATA_NOT_FOUND: Billing data with given ID does not exist.
INVALID_DEPOSIT_TYPE: Select a valid deposit to type(1=Deposit to Us,2=Deposit to county)
INVALID_AMOUNT: Amount must be a numeric value.
GROUP_BY_ONE_FILTER_ERR: At least one filter value is needed, while using task grouping.
ERR_TASKS_NOT_FOUND: A few of the selected tasks might not exist.
ERR_MIN_LENGTH: {field} must be at least {limit} characters long.
ERR_NO_CHANGES_DETECTED: Data is already up to date.
DUPLICATE_ENTRY_TRANSACTION_FORM: Combination of form and transactions already exists.
DUPLICATE_ENTRY_COUNTY_FORM: Combination of form and county already exists.
ERR_EXPIRE_DATE: Expire date must be today or a future date.
ERR_PROCESSING_DATE: Processing date cannot be on a Saturday or Sunday.
ERR_PROCESSING_PAST_DATE: Processing date must be a future date.
ERR_PROCESSING_DATE_FORMAT: Processing date must be a valid date (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).
ERR_ADD_PROCESSING_DATE: At least one of the dates (dropDateProcessing, walkDateProcessing, mailDateProcessing) must be provided.
ERR_UPLOAD_CSV: Please upload a valid CSV file.
ERR_RUNNER_NOTE_MAX_LENGTH: Maximum 300 Characters are allowed for Runner note.
